page.title: 09RECREATION IN BRANSTON
page.content: Branston has a large number of little clubs, (see clubs). It also has a community college which runs evening classes and has a swimming pool. We wanted to find how many people used the comprehensive facilties and what people did in their spare time so we interviewed 1% of the village. We asked people questions like: Which form of recreation do you enjoy the most? Most people clearly preferred watching TV to doing anything else. But other people enjoyed things like fishing,walking and sporting events. People rarely seemed to use the comprehensive. We were quite surprised at this because the comprehensive runs clubs and evening classes.These cover a wide variety of subjects including metal work,language courses and cookery.We thought that these would be more popular.
